seo: VMware,远程代码执行漏洞,CVE-2021-21985,插件,检测
summary: 该插件用于检测VMware vCenter Server是否存在CVE-2021-21985远程代码执行漏洞，通过发送多个HTTP请求验证目标系统是否受影响。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether VMware vCenter Server has the CVE-2021-21985 Remote Code Execution vulnerability by sending multiple HTTP requests to verify if the target system is affected.
